widgets.title: Daily Ingest Rate By Account (Time Series)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'Daily Ingest Rate' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago facet consumingAccountName limit max
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 30 day) AS '30 Day Rate' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago limit max compare with 1 month ago TIMESERIES 7 days
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 30 day) AS avgGbIngest FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago facet usageMetric limit max compare with 1 month ago
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 30 day) AS avgGbIngest FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago facet consumingAccountName limit max compare with 1 month ago

widgets.title: Daily Ingest Rate (Compare With 3 Months Prior)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'Daily Ingest Rate' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max COMPARE WITH 3 months ago
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max facet usageMetric
SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'Daily Rate' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago limit max compare with 1 month ago
SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) AS '30 Day Sum' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago limit max compare with 1 month ago
SELECT derivative(GigabytesIngested, 7 day) AS 'GB Ingest Derivative' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max facet usageMetric

rawConfiguration.text:
## Relevant NR1 Docs

### Solutions Guides

[Data Governance Solutions Guide](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/new-relic-solutions/observability-maturity/introduction)

### Technical Docs

[Manage Incoming Data](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/data-apis/manage-data/manage-data-coming-new-relic/)

[Data Management Hub](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/data-apis/manage-data/manage-your-data/)

[Drop Data Using Nerdgraph](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/data-apis/manage-data/drop-data-using-nerdgraph/)

[Alert on Data Ingest Anomalies](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/accounts/accounts-billing/new-relic-one-pricing-billing/usage-queries-alerts/)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) AS 'gb_ingest_30_day_sum', rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'gb_ingest_daily_rate', derivative(GigabytesIngested, 90 day) as 'gb_ingest_90_day_derivative' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' since 30 days ago facet consumingAccountId, consumingAccountName, usageMetric  limit max

rawConfiguration.text:
# TIP

# For a much deeper view into the sources of ingest that contribute to `InfraIntegrationBytes` Install the *Infrastructure Integration Analysis* [dashboard](https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts/tree/main/quickstarts/audit/infrastructure-integrations-data-analysis) form New Relic I/O.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS 'Daily Ingest Rate' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' and usageMetric = 'ServerlessBytes' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max COMPARE WITH 3 months ago

SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 day) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' and usageMetric = 'ServerlessBytes' TIMESERIES AUTO since 9 months ago limit max facet consumingAccountName
SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) AS avgGbIngestTimeseries FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' and usageMetric = 'ServerlessBytes' since 1 months ago limit max facet consumingAccountName

SELECT rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 30 day) AS avgGbIngest FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' and usageMetric = 'ServerlessBytes' since 30 days ago facet consumingAccountName limit max compare with 1 month ago
